recipe.title: Raspberry Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; red wine vinegar ; (60 mL)

steps.step: Add Dijon mustard, raspberries, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil into a mason jar and secure lid tightly.
Shake vigorously until ingredients are mixed thoroughly.
Store dressing in the fridge and use within 1-2 weeks. You may need to shake up the ingredients again before each use.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add Dijon mustard, raspberries, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil into a mason jar and secure lid tightly.
Shake vigorously until ingredients are mixed thoroughly.
Store dressing in the fridge and use within 1-2 weeks.
You may need to shake up the ingredients again before each use.
